overview:
As President and CEO, Corporate and Trade Show, Scott Hansen is responsible for the automotive, corporate and trade show markets in North America as well as global coordination of our efforts in these markets. Scott oversees operations in Orlando, Atlanta, Nashville, Toronto, Michigan, Chicago, Denver and Las Vegas. These operations integrate the lighting, audio, video, LED and scenic disciplines together with PRGâ€™s technical resources to provide a full-service solution to clients.

Since joining PRG in May 1997, Scott has been involved in both financial and operational management of the company. He performed essential financial roles including Controller and Chief Financial Officer. Scott received a BS in Accounting from the University at Albany in New York and is a Certified Public Accountant. He joined PRG from the professional services firm Ernst & Young.
